title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 7 categories on the x axis representing Month, and Number of subscribers in thousands in each Month on the y axis.
June 2018 is higher than any other categories with value 3000.0, followed by March 2018, and January 2018. Down to category December 2016 with the lowest value of 20.0.
The highest value at June 2018 is almost 150.0 times larger than the minimum value of December 2016.

The difference between the max Month June 2018 and min Month December 2016 is 2980.0.
